item.title: Problem with items, please help me! :|
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

Heres my problem:

I want to get firemaking working on my server, the problem is, i cant make it work!~
Theres a section for items being used on other items (case 53 at mine,)

heres the code:

case 53: // Use Item on another Item junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int usedWithSlot = inStream.readSignedWord(); int itemUsedSlot = inStream.readSignedWordA(); int useWith = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); int p4 = inStream.readSignedWord(); int itemUsed = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int p6 = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("swodlayer")) { sendMessage("Item: "+useWith+" used with item: "+itemUsed); sendMessage("usedwithslot: "+usedWithSlot+" itemusedslot: "+itemUsedSlot+" usewith: "+useWith+" p4: "+p4+" itemused: "+itemUsed+" p6: "+p6); } { //flec(woodSlot); //herblore shit! //grinding if(itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 590) { if(playerLevel[11] >= 1) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); createNewTileObject(absX, absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(40, 11); } else { sendMessage("An error occured, please report to an admin."); } } else if(itemUsed == 985 && useWith == 987) { deleteItem(985,getItemSlot(985),1); deleteItem(987,getItemSlot(987),1); addItem(989,1); sendMessage("You attach the two key halves to make a crystal key!"); }

However, i get the debug line wich says “Item: 1511 used with item 50”

the strange thing is, nothing happens.

Please, dont give me stupid answers like get another source, that pisses me off, cause i wont (not much of help eh?)
My server base is testscape.

Please help, and thanks in advance!

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with items, please help me! :|
